Title: vcseVBA - version controlled software engineering in VBA
Description: Simplify distributed application development for Visual Basic for Applications with this Excel Addin
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Simplify distributed application development for Visual Basic for Applications with this Excel Addin

Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) is originally an integrated programming language for Microsoft Office which is also useful to automate various other Windows Applications.

This Addin tries to simplify the distributed development in VBA for Microsoft Excel and make it easier for developers to add their source to version control systems.

 

The testing parts of this Addin are based on xlUnit by Mike Woodhouse

 

documentation on how to use this addin will be made available in the first week of July 2013
